page.title: 15Sports in Caerau
page.content: {Football}is the main sport in {Caerau. To}develop this interest in sport Brian Williams and a group of interested people in 1977 set up a committee and formed the{Caerau Boys Club.}The club meets once a week to train. In 1984 the most successful team were the under 14's which were beaten only twice. As {cricket}is not one of the most popular games in Caerau not many people play but Martin Wiltshire a former pupil of Blaencaerau School has gone on to play for Wales. Our national sport in Wales is rugby. In the last twelve months there have been two boys from Caerau capped for the Wales youth. In 1985 Blaencaerau third year mini rugby team won through to the national finals at{Cardiff Arms Park.
